EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-01-25 MS EoS Third Email Send - US Non MQLs.ES-2019-01-25 MS EoS Third E
EmailTemplate.subject: Less than 12 months to go. Are you ready?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
When Windows Server & SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 go end of support in the next 12 months, Microsoft will no longer issue security updates. When this happens, enterprises like yours will be left vulnerable to security attacks and out of compliance with business and industry regulations.
How will you ensure you and your team are ready? Our eBook <[[https://turbonomic.com/ms-2008-eos/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ldAAA]]> can help!
<[[https://turbonomic.com/ms-2008-eos/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ldAAA]]>
In this eBook <[[https://turbonomic.com/ms-2008-eos/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ldAAA]]>, Brien Posey, renowned tech author, Former CIO and 17-time Microsoft MVP, guides you through best practices in advance of Windows 2008 & SQL 2008 End of Support dates.
I hope you find it helpful!
Best, Andrew
